PROJECT(DBO_PLANE)

# Internal dependencies
FILE(GLOB DBO_PLANE_SRCS ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/*.c)

# Internal dependencies
INCLUDE(${SHADERVM_SOURCE_DIR}/export.cmake)
INCLUDE(${AQSISTYPES_SOURCE_DIR}/export.cmake)

ADD_LIBRARY(dbo_plane SHARED ${DBO_PLANE_SRCS} ${INFORES_SRCS})

SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(dbo_plane PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "dbo_plane" SOVERSION ${MAJOR} VERSION "${MAJOR}.${MINOR}")

INSTALL(TARGETS dbo_plane
	RUNTIME DESTINATION ${SHADERDIR})
